headline: BOOM STAND
description: Microscope Boom Stand w/ Rotatable Knuckle    Stands can be fitted for B&L StereoZoom Microscopes, Leica StereoZoom Microscopes, Nikon StereoZoom Microscopes, and Olympus StereoZoom Microscopes  Available only with purchase of a Stereozoom Microscope   E-arm not included
model: Microscope Boom Stand w/ Rotatable Knuckle
categories.lvl2: Microscopes  >  Microscope Parts and Accessories > Stands
specstable:
Model Microscope Boom Stand w/ Rotatable Knuckle
Type Boom (Type S)
Other Information
  • Stand can be fitted for B&L SereoZoom microscopes, Leica StereoZoom microscopes, Nikon StereoZoom microscopes, and Olympus StereoZoom Microscopes.
    Check our inventory for availability
  • E-arm not included. Check our inventory for availability

    Stand includes: Base, vertical post, rotatable knuckle, memory ring, and horizontal post
    Dimensions:
    Base- 10" x 10" x 1"
    Vertical post- 14.25"
    Horizontal post- 20.5"

Exterior Dimensions
Height 15.250 in (38.7 cm)
